commit message: Fixed some potential bugs using static analysis
Moved the mediaBrowser object to the common TopActivity class
Migrated some of the player state managment to the new media browser interface
Fixed issue where SlimEpisodes could not be played
Fixed some UI issues with SlimSubscriptions
Removed sqliBrite and started using Android SQLite support library for better read performance
Animated the visibility of the FAB button in the FeedView
Styled the Download Manager to match the rest of the app
Mitigated crash. Not sure I have fixed the root cause
Experimenting with collapsing the tabs instead of the toolbar when scrolling
Some UI performance optimizations, now with less overdraw
Fixed bug when added unpersisted episodes to the Library
Fixed 'clear all' in the downloadmanager. Fixed long standing issue where the download button could have the episode reset
Added libpastelog from Signal for easy log uploading
Updated the infrastructure to okhttp3 and retrofit2 2.0.1
